OrgName.entry: VOLUNTARY ACTION SHEFFIELD - MENTAL HEALTH TRAINING PROJECT

Desc.entry: A registered charity that provides training around the key themes of: mental health awareness; foundation/core skills for those working with people with mental health problems; training needs analysis and developing the participation and involvement role of service users and carers, in both delivering and participating in training. Offers "bite sized" awareness sessions, a wide-ranging programme of training events, and can also provide tailored training to meet groups' needs. The training is principally targeted at community, voluntary and faith-based organisations, but is open to workers from statutory services too.
